snippet: In 28 years on the federal bench, Judge Beezer wrote influential opinions on capital punishment, copyright law on the Internet and Anna Nicole Smith’s claim to a huge inheritance.
abstract: Robert R Beezer, conservative judge on the liberal-leaning Ninth Circuit Appeals Court, and who wrote influential opinions on capital punishment, copyright law on the Internet and Anna Nicole Smith’s claim to a huge inheritance, dies at age 83.
lead_paragraph: In 28 years on the federal bench, Judge Beezer wrote influential opinions on capital punishment, copyright law on the Internet and Anna Nicole Smith’s claim to a huge inheritance.

headline.seo: Robert R. Beezer, Judge on Ninth Circuit, Dies at 83
headline.main: Robert R. Beezer, Conservative Voice on Liberal Court, Dies at 83
headline.print_headline: Robert R. Beezer, 83, Conservative Voice on Liberal Court
